name: High-Waist Training Leggings
description: Premium polo shirt with modern design and comfortable fit.
fullDescription: This premium Adidas polo shirt combines classic style with modern performance features. Made from high-quality cotton blend, it offers exceptional comfort and durability. Perfect for casual outings or sporting activities.

description: Premium polo shirt with modern design and comfortable fit.
fullDescription: This premium Adidas polo shirt combines classic style with modern performance features. Made from high-quality cotton blend, it offers exceptional comfort and durability. Perfect for casual outings or sporting activities.

description: Premium polo shirt with modern design and comfortable fit.
fullDescription: This premium Adidas polo shirt combines classic style with modern performance features. Made from high-quality cotton blend, it offers exceptional comfort and durability. Perfect for casual outings or sporting activities.

name: Full-Support Sports Bra
description: Premium polo shirt with modern design and comfortable fit.
fullDescription: This premium Adidas polo shirt combines classic style with modern performance features. Made from high-quality cotton blend, it offers exceptional comfort and durability. Perfect for casual outings or sporting activities.

name: Adidas X Pop Polo Shirt
description: Premium polo shirt with modern design and comfortable fit.
fullDescription: This premium Adidas polo shirt combines classic style with modern performance features. Made from high-quality cotton blend, it offers exceptional comfort and durability. Perfect for casual outings or sporting activities.

name: Adidas X Pop TRX Vintage
description: Vintage-inspired TRX jacket with retro design elements.
fullDescription: Embrace retro style with this vintage-inspired Adidas TRX jacket. Featuring classic design elements and modern comfort, this jacket is perfect for casual wear or light athletic activities.

name: Adidas X Pop Beckenbauer Track Jacket
description: Classic Beckenbauer track jacket with iconic design.
fullDescription: The iconic Adidas Beckenbauer track jacket returns with its classic design and modern updates. This jacket features the signature three stripes and comfortable fit that made it a legend.

name: Adidas X Pop Classic T-shirt
description: adidas X Pop Classic t-shirt, grey / navy
fullDescription: Experience ultimate comfort and support with our High-Waist Training Leggings. Designed for high-intensity workouts, these leggings feature our patented FlexFit technology that moves with you. The four-way stretch fabric provides compression where you need it while allowing full range of motion. Perfect for yoga, running, weight training, or any activity that demands both style and performance.

name: Nike Tech Fleece Joggers
description: Nike Tech Fleece Joggers, black/dark grey
fullDescription: Stay warm without the bulk in the Nike Tech Fleece Joggers. Featuring a modern, streamlined silhouette, these pants offer lightweight warmth and comfort. The tapered fit and ribbed cuffs give a clean look, perfect for everyday wear or warming up before a workout. Multiple zippered pockets provide secure storage.

name: Under Armour HeatGear Compression Tee
description: UA HeatGear Compression T-shirt, royal blue
fullDescription: Designed to keep you cool and dry, the HeatGear Compression Tee is perfect for intense training sessions. Its ultra-tight, second-skin fit delivers powerful support. The four-way stretch construction allows for better movement in every direction, and the fabric wicks sweat quickly to the surface.

name: Reebok Nano X4 Training Shoes
description: Reebok Nano X4 cross-training shoe, neon green/black
fullDescription: The Nano X4 is built for versatility in the gym. It offers a stable platform for lifting, flexibility for dynamic movements, and comfort for running. Featuring a durable Flexweave upper and a responsive Floatride Energy Foam cushioning.

name: Puma Classic Suede Sneakers
description: Puma Suede Classic XXI, burgundy/white
fullDescription: A legendary silhouette, the Puma Suede Classic has been an icon since its debut in 1968. Featuring a soft suede upper and the signature Puma Formstrip, these sneakers offer a timeless look and reliable rubber outsole for traction.

specifications.Care: Wipe clean with a damp cloth

name: New Balance 990v6 Running Shoe
description: New Balance 990v6, grey/navy/red
fullDescription: The latest evolution of the iconic 990 line, the v6 provides a perfect blend of cushioning and style. Featuring FuelCell and ENCAP midsole technologies for optimal performance, this shoe delivers enduring comfort for both running and daily wear.

name: The North Face Denali Fleece Jacket
description: The North Face Denali Fleece, black
fullDescription: An iconic fleece jacket, the Denali provides warmth and comfort in cool weather. Features include reinforced shoulders, chest, and forearms to resist abrasion, and a high-pile fleece body. Perfect for layering or as a standalone piece.

name: Lululemon Align High-Rise Pant
description: Lululemon Align Pant 28", magenta
fullDescription: The buttery-soft Nulu fabric makes the Align Pant feel like a second skin. Designed for yoga and low-impact activities, these high-rise leggings offer weightless coverage and unrestricted movement. They feature a hidden waistband pocket for small essentials.

specifications.Care: Machine wash cold, lay flat to dry

name: Champion Reverse Weave Hoodie
description: Champion Reverse Weave Pullover Hoodie, oxford grey
fullDescription: Known for its heavyweight, durable construction, the Reverse Weave Hoodie resists vertical shrinkage, ensuring a long-lasting fit. Featuring a double-layer hood and signature rib side panels for ease of movement. A true classic.

name: Adidas Adilette Comfort Slides
description: Adidas Adilette Slides, cloud white/navy
fullDescription: The ultimate in post-workout comfort, the Adilette slides feature a contoured footbed and a cloudfoam plus cushioning that provides soft, plush comfort. Perfect for the gym shower, pool, or casual wear.

name: Patagonia Baggies Shorts 5"
description: Patagonia Baggies Shorts, stone blue
fullDescription: Durable, multi-functional shorts designed for wear in and out of the water. Made with quick-drying recycled nylon, they feature a 5-inch inseam, an elasticized waistband with an internal drawstring, and vertical side pockets that reduce drag in the water.

name: Asics Gel-Kayano 30
description: Asics Gel-Kayano 30 stability running shoe, cobalt/lime
fullDescription: The Gel-Kayano 30 is a premium stability shoe, now featuring 4D GUIDANCE SYSTEM technology for adaptive support. It offers maximum comfort and shock absorption thanks to its PureGEL technology and FF BLAST PLUS ECO cushioning.

name: Columbia PFG Tamiami Shirt
description: Columbia PFG Tamiami II long sleeve fishing shirt, fossil
fullDescription: Built for long days on the water, this shirt features Omni-Wick moisture management and Omni-Shade UPF 40 sun protection. Its lightweight, quick-drying fabric and strategic venting keep you cool and comfortable in the heat.

name: Vans Sk8-Hi MTE-3 Boots
description: Vans Sk8-Hi MTE-3 all-weather high-top, black/marshmallow
fullDescription: Take on the elements with the Sk8-Hi MTE-3. This shoe features an advanced thermal regulation package, waterproof membrane, and a dynamic All-Trac MTE-3 outsole for serious traction. Perfect for cold, wet conditions.

name: Reigning Champ Midweight Crewneck
description: Reigning Champ Midweight Terry Crewneck Sweatshirt, heather ash
fullDescription: Handcrafted in Canada, this crewneck is made from premium midweight terry, offering exceptional comfort and durability. Features include flatlock seams, set-in/raglan sleeves, and rib cuffs. A classic staple for elevated casual wear.

name: Arc'teryx Atom LT Hoody
description: Arc'teryx Atom LT insulated hoody, forcefield orange
fullDescription: An incredibly versatile synthetic insulated hoody that excels as a mid-layer or standalone jacket. Features Coreloft Compact insulation for warmth, a water-resistant shell, and stretch fleece side panels for ventilation and freedom of movement.

name: Hydro Flask 40 oz Wide Mouth
description: Hydro Flask Wide Mouth Water Bottle (40 oz), olive
fullDescription: Keep your drinks cold for 24 hours and hot for 12 hours with the TempShield double-wall vacuum insulation. Made from durable 18/8 pro-grade stainless steel. The wide mouth is perfect for adding ice cubes.

name: Oakley Frogskins Sunglasses
description: Oakley Frogskins Prizm lenses, matte black frame
fullDescription: A throwback to the 80s, the Frogskins combine classic style with modern technology. Features lightweight O Matter frame material and Prizm lens technology designed to enhance color, contrast, and detail.

name: Salomon Speedcross 6 Trail Running
description: Salomon Speedcross 6, black/red, trail running
fullDescription: Lighter and with an even more powerful grip, the Speedcross 6 is engineered for maximum performance on technical trails. The aggressive Contagrip outsole with revised lug geometry sheds mud faster for better traction.

name: Carhartt K87 Pocket T-shirt
description: Carhartt Heavyweight K87 short-sleeve pocket t-shirt, moss green
fullDescription: A rugged workwear classic, this heavyweight cotton t-shirt is built for durability and comfort. Features a relaxed fit, a ribbed crewneck, and a convenient left-chest pocket with the Carhartt label.

name: Smartwool Classic Hike Socks
description: Smartwool Classic Hike Light Cushion Crew Socks, deep navy
fullDescription: These merino wool socks offer unparalleled comfort, natural moisture management, and temperature regulation. Featuring a light cushion for performance with less bulk, and a supportive arch brace. Ideal for hiking or everyday wear.
